page.title: 10SHOPPING IN TYDD ST. GILES
page.content: In this village we have two shops.The two shops are very near each other,in fact they are on the same road,Church Lane. One of our shops is called the Corner Shop,and was built in 1945,so it's about 40 years old.It sells general things and petrol and you can buy almost anything there.The number of people that comes to the Corner Shop varies, but I would think is about 80 a day .The shop is owned by the Quinns. The corner shop is on a T junction so lots of people see it,not like the Post Office which is our other shop.The Post Office is hidden in some trees near the Church so people can't see it very well.The Post Office is older than the Corner shop and was built in 1800, so is nearly 200 years old.
